rsbNotes.title: Pr 29:21
rsbNotes.text: 29:21 will in the end. In what is perhaps a better reading, the Septuagint (Greek Old Testament) translates this, “in the end he will come to grief.” Servants who are not corrected and disciplined will be a source of grief (v. 19).

rsbNotes.title: Pr 29:22
rsbNotes.text: 29:22 stirs up strife. See 15:18 and note.
